sqlMap.select: SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM dat_channel t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE ORDER BY id,inputtime LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$;
SELECT count(1) AS counts FROM dat_channel t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE
select * FROM _dat_warehouse t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND isfba = TRUE LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _dat_warehouse t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND isfba = TRUE
